resources.string: Welcome to the Rhythm library showcase!
This app demonstrates the capabilities of the library and how it can be used in a real project. You are welcome to examine its source code on GitHub.
Do you agree with this white and purple marshmallow?

Open the Notification drawer to access Rhythm Quick Control, which allows you to cycle through configurations without leaving your current screen. Go ahead and play around with overlays for different provided groups.
As of v0.9, Rhythm allows you to mix and match these spec layer types to make various overlays:

string-array.name: bullet_points
string-array.item: Horizontal and vertical grid lines, repeating at a fixed step, with optional offset and margins. Add two grid line layers to make a grid.\n
Guides of arbitrary color and thickness, to make keylines and highlights.\n
Dimensions label, to inspect view’s dimensions at glance.\n
More spec layer types coming soon; meanwhile you can create custom ones.
